markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swashbuckler's Speed](/Feats.aspx?ID=6238) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=235)

**Prerequisites**
[Swashbuckler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6233)

</column>

---

You move with a swashbuckler’s speed and grace. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds; this increases to a +10-foot status bonus while you have panache.
name: Swashbuckler's Speed
